programme.title: Most Daring - Riots & Rumbles 2 (Season 7, Episode 10)
programme.desc: Two restaurant workers use wrestling moves against an armed robber; a younger surfer is attacked after wandering onto a locals-only beach; hurt feelings at a wedding escalate into a family feud.

programme.title: Most Daring - Clueless Crooks (Season 1, Episode 3)
programme.desc: Dumb criminals get caught in the act; a blackjack player doubles down with a bag of marijuana; a drunk driver tries to beat a sobriety test by guzzling white-out; a climbing criminal falls and breaks a leg.

programme.title: Court Cam - Court Cam - 208 (Season 2, Episode 7)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: A judge loses his job when his temper gets the best of him; a taser comes out when a standard security check gets physical; a father gains national attention through an unforgettable act of forgiveness.

programme.title: Court Cam - Court Cam (#108) (Season 1, Episode 8)
programme.desc: Two brothers brutally attack their mother's murderer during his sentencing; a young woman messes with the wrong judge in bond court; an unrepentant murder suspect makes unveiled threats at the judge; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam - Court Cam - 205 (Season 2, Episode 4)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: A frustrated robbery suspect doesn't like his attorney, and shows it with his fist; a judge and defendant have an unlikely tearful reunion.

programme.title: Court Cam - Court Cam - 202 (Season 2, Episode 1)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: A Russian man convicted of murder attempts an impossible escape from a high-security courtroom; a judge goes off on a disrespectful defendant.

programme.title: Most Daring - Wild Behind the Wheel (Season 6, Episode 2)
programme.desc: A wayward lemon truck sours motorists' morning commute, a vehicle goes on a full-throttle rampage and a snowmobile runs into trouble.

programme.title: Most Daring - Outrageous Outlaws (Season 4, Episode 3)
programme.desc: Footage of outrageous outlaws committing outlandish deeds; men disguised as police officers abduct a cocktail waitress; rival soccer fans clash; a felon tries to flee police by driving in reverse.
